hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT distinct EOCC_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, REC_VER, REC_STATUS, ORG_ID, TIME_ZONE, PM_CODE, COMPANY_CODE, SITE_CODE, EOCC_EOCS_CODE, EOCC_NO, EOCC_LEFT_BRACKET, EOCC_COLUMN_CODE, EOCC_OPERATE, EOCC_VALUE, EOCC_RIGHT_BRACKET, EOCC_CONTROL_LOGIC FROM EO_CONFIRM_CONDITION WHERE 1=1 << AND ORG_ID = :orgId >> << AND SITE_CODE = :siteCode >> << AND EOCC_EOCS_CODE = :eoccEocsCode >> << AND EOCC_EOCS_CODE IN (:eoccEocsCodes) >> ORDER BY EOCC_NO ASC
